problem.p: The velocity of a car is measured at several different times and the recorded data are plotted below. Draw a best fit line to approximate these data, and determine the car's acceleration and its velocity at time \(t=0\).)

ul.li: Slope can be hidden using show_slope_for_lines=false
If this problem were used in a real course, followup questions should be placed in a separate block and the red point graders should be removed.

problem.p: This problem checks that the best fit line approximately goes through two specific points. The acceptable range of best fit lines is roughly indicated by the pairs of red dots.
